LanguageData.PGI_CutterWorksiteButcherRecipe.label: butchering
LanguageData.PGI_CutterWorksiteButcherRecipe.descript: Butcher a corpse, whether its made of flesh or metal.
LanguageData.PGI_CutterWorksiteRecycleRecipe.label: smelting
LanguageData.PGI_CutterWorksiteRecycleRecipe.descript: Cut useless weapons and apparel into pieces and try to retrieve useful resources.
